item.title: Black & Yellow
item.description:
I found myself in possession of this theme after it had been unlisted by its original creator from the directory. If you are the original creator/know who they are, please respond to this thread in the forums.

Original Description
A dark theme. Inspired by the native Notes app.

Posted by David Blue

Install

item.title: VantaBlack (but rather grey)
item.description:
Black Lives Matter so, a Drafts Dark Theme too!

It’s not about a productive user interface/experience. Rather, it’s about reminding you that Black Lives Matter just as White Lives Matter…

If you want to directly fund the movement or make a donation. Visit the link below:

https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ms_blm_homepage_2019

Posted by meetheverse

Install

item.title: Six Colors (Dark)
item.description:
A dark theme inspired by Apple’s six colors logo, and my site, HeyDingus.net. Designed for use with monospaced fonts in which formatting does not change the font size.

(Adapted from Things Dark Mono theme.)

Posted by _heyjarrod

Install

item.title: Six Colors (Light)
item.description:
A light theme inspired by Apple’s six colors logo, and my site, HeyDingus.net. Designed for use with monospaced fonts in which formatting does not change the font size.

(Adapted from Things Light Mono theme.)

Posted by _heyjarrod

Install

item.title: Siena Dark
item.description:
Thme imparfait, orient criture multimarkdown avec contrastes pour yeux fatigus (en tous cas, pour ceux de celui qui la bricol). Version sombre

Posted by urbanbike

Install

item.title: Siena Light
item.description:
